title: 2 workers killed in crane collapse at Everett construction site
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Local News "It devastates us that our members and their families were impacted by this unfortunate incident," the Pile Drivers and Divers Local 56 union said.
The crane collapse in Everett prompted a wide response from police, fire officals, and EMS.
Jonathan Wiggs/The Boston Globe Two workers were killed Friday after a crane collapsed at an industrial job site in Everett.

title: Stefon Diggs finally gets ‘long overdue’ first touchdown with Patriots
author: Khari A. Thompson
bullets: New England Patriots Diggs scored on a one-yard pass during the blowout victory.
Stefon Diggs celebrates after scoring a Patriots touchdown against the Browns.
AP Photo/Charles Krupa Stefon Diggs finally scored his first touchdown in a Patriots uniform eight weeks into the season on a one-yard pass from Drake Maye.

title: Why Mike Vrabel changed decades-long Bill Belichick tradition at Gillette Stadium

title: More than 20 hikers rescued from Mount Washington amid wintery conditions
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Local News The hikers were hypothermic and lacking the proper gear needed to face the frigid temperatures when they were found and rescued.
Nearly two dozen hikers had to be rescued from Mount Washington after they found themselves unprepared for the frigid condiitons.

Mount Washington Observatory By Darin Zullo October 26, 2025 | 6:37 PM 1 minute to read Nearly two dozen hikers had to be rescued Saturday after they found themselves stranded and hypothermic on the summit of Mount Washington in New Hampshire.

title: Mike Vrabel says he benched Christian Barmore to ‘protect the team’
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: New England Patriots "When there are actions that I don’t feel like are commensurate with what we want to do here, I have to make a decision.
" Christian Barmore didn't play in the entire first quarter on Sunday.

(AP Photo/Charles Krupa) By Conor Ryan October 26, 2025 | 6:19 PM 1 minute to read FOXBOROUGH — Christian Barmore has played a key role in New England’s impressive 6-2 start to the 2025 season, with the 26-year-old defensive tackle routinely wreaking havoc at the line of scrimmage so far this fall.

title: Patriots stock watch: Here’s who stood out and struggled in lopsided win against Browns

Cooper FOXBOROUGH – Make it five wins in a row for the red-hot Patriots.

title: 8 takeaways from Patriots’ blowout win over Browns
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: New England Patriots Despite facing plenty of pressure from Myles Garrett, Drake Maye still threw for 3 touchdowns against Cleveland.
Jaylinn Hawkins and the Patriots had plenty of reasons to celebrate on Sunday.

title: Morgan Geekie: ‘My dad would be proud’ of last-second goal against Avs
author: Conor Ryan

title: Former Patriots RB urges fans not to panic about TreVeyon Henderson’s playing time, productivity
author: Conor Roche
bullets: New England Patriots "I don't think it's necessarily a trust issue.
" TreVeyon Henderson only had two carries in the Patriots' win over the Titans in Week 7.
(AP Photo/John Amis) After dazzling in training camp and the preseason, TreVeyon Henderson hasn’t lived up to expectations so far in his rookie season as his playing time has fluctuated.
